name: Trusted Handyman LLC
address: 2671 Park W Blvd, Mt Pleasant, SC 29466, USA

reviews.author: Lauren Hornick
reviews.text: I had a great experience with The Trusted Handyman. Jason did an excellent job on the repairs I needed.  He was professional, detail-oriented, and his work turned out beautiful. Stephen, the owner, was quick to respond and made scheduling easy, getting everything taken care of in a timely manner and at a fair price. I really appreciate their reliability and quality of work. Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Mary G Sprague
reviews.text: The entire team at trusted handyman is fantastic! Great communication, fair prices, and outstanding work. They repaired a few walls for us, painted, and did tiling in the laundry room. Very happy with their work!

reviews.author: Michael VanLerberg
reviews.text:
I hired “Trusted handyman” and wish I hadn’t…..I found them on Nextdoor and some lady there tried to warn me off so thought it only prudent to post my negative experience.

I Hired him for a simple bathtub installation. Came on a Thursday and installed the tub without the required rim boards which is required by the installation instructions and was discussed in writing prior. When I reminded him day before they must be installed his response was “we know”. Then they didn’t install. Quite the attitude for what’s the come….

He came back out on Friday to add the boards and reinstall. While I’m at work him and his counterpart text me multiple times job is complete now and they want payment. He threatens to sue me for payment on Monday…again this is the SAME DAY they finished within a couple hours since the job is “complete”. Stephen sounded like a desperate money hungry psychopath in my opinion. Alarm bell starts ringing….

I tell them especially since previous days misinstallation I will inspect it and water test before paying them. They try making excuse that “you also can’t use water until tile is installed”. What a lie! Thank goodness I didn’t listen.

So the next morning I cut off the tube he had blocked and ran the water and guess what? It leaking like a wide open sieve and damaged the ceiling below. (Video below)

Long story short I had to hire an actual plumber who tore out and redid all their shoddy work. The plumbing they did to the spout didn’t meet code either and was off center. No washer or propert sealant was installed on the tub drain which is why it leaked. Was also installed way off center. No fasteners were installed in the tub either. It’s hard finding ANYTHING that was done properly.

He even had the gall to state “you telling us how to do the work and I’m just wondering why you just didn’t do it yourself?? We did a good job at a fair price.”

I regret hiring them and wouldn’t recommend…to say the least. Photos and video below.

Based on previous reviews he's going to say this is "Fake" and he never worked for me. He doesn't do contracts? Just to get ahead of that....I've posted our contract.

He's also not licensed in the state of South Carolina to perform plumbing work..…

reviews.author: Sylvalyn Hammond
reviews.text: Stephen and his technician, Sean, did an incredible job turning my Pinterest vision into a reality when we turned our guest room into our son’s “big boy room”. Sean was always courteous when coming and going and did his best to clean up after himself. Stephen’s price was fair and he was easy to contact with questions and concerns. We will surely have them out for more work in the future and wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them.

reviews.author: Stephanie L
reviews.text: Wow if I could do 100 reviews to boost their stars I would! Hands down the best crews and leader Steve. He was onsite every day,  check in every morning and afternoon. They went above and beyond to ensure the work was aligned with our needs and requirements to code. Any job moving forward we will be working with Steve and his crew!  They remediated mold damage, removed and replaced 2200 sqft of Sheetrock, painted and did electrical. Next building a bar and finishing a basement.

name: Charleston Handyman
address: 1608 Camp Rd Ste 89, Charleston, SC 29412, USA

reviews.author: Wesley Rudolph
reviews.text: After searching for a painter for several weeks, I chose Charleston Handyman Services to paint several rooms in our home. They were on-time and on-budget, with no surprises. Excellent work and very professional. Five Stars and highly recommend them. Great Prices Too!

reviews.author: Abel Cullen
reviews.text: Just wanted to reach out to say thank you. You guys did an amazing job on our living room and dining room flooring. We love the new laminate floors and thrilled to get rid of the carpeting. Keep up the good work, thanks again. PS Our neighbor is going to call you...told ya.

reviews.author: Christy Daugherty
reviews.text: No showed and wouldn't reply after I left voicemails.

name: Handyman on Johns Island
address: 2960 Cane Slash Rd, Johns Island, SC 29455, USA

reviews.author: Elizabeth Finein
reviews.text: Kenny was very polite and professional.  Not only did he fix the massive clog in our washer but noticed a leak around the washer door and fixed that as well. I highly recommend Kenny and his company.

reviews.author: Kimmy Spaventa
reviews.text: Kenny was extremely professional, courteous, and communicative. He came to fix structural damage to a bedroom ceiling and we also asked if he would install fans and a light fixture while here. He fixed it all and took extra care to paint and clean everything up. He talked us through his process and outlined pricing very clearly. As new home owners we were very grateful to have his knowledge and kindness - he even stopped to help a neighbor kid fix his bike chain and let us know one our pipes were leaking outside. For issues moving forward we will definitely be calling Kenny!

reviews.author: Joseph M Morris
reviews.text: Kenny was awesome. Very polite, knowledgeable, efficient, helpful & outstanding work. It seemed like he knew everything about everything. He installed 4 remote ceiling fans for us in record time & all work great. Very fair pricing & he gave us many helpful hints & ideas about other projects. Can't wait to use him again. Very punctual as well.

reviews.author: Patty Constanty
reviews.text:
Kenny completed several projects at my home today, including installing a post in my backyard for a birdhouse, installing shelves and hanging a large and heavy wall art.
Kenny was prompt and from the start, he was  polite and made sure he knew exactly how I wanted each project done. He went right to work and did a great job. His rate are reasonable and I could not be happier. Thanks so much

reviews.author: Thomas
reviews.text: Kenny was one of the most professional people I have worked with. He was always on time. He always cleaned up after himself and the work that he does is phenomenal! I already have him doing work at my parents house. No need looking around, you found the best right here!
